QuestData.Title: Soul Surrender
QuestData.Description: We assault the mogu at the Court of Bones, but I fear we merely send them fodder for their abominable rituals.$B$BThe mogu do not merely kill their prisoners - they steal their souls and imbue them in machinations of stone, or reforge the fallen into ghostly tools of war.$B$BHorde or Alliance, it matters not. We cannot allow the mogu to bolster their numbers.$B$BGo into the crypts. Free any prisoners that are still living.
QuestData.LogDescription: Save 6 Sunreaver Scouts or Silver Covenant Scouts.
